CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 9, 1959, pg. 27, reads: "Postal Alliance Will Meet on May 16-17."  Portion of accompanying article reads: "Pittsburgh will be the scene of the 27th annual District 6 convention of the National Alliance of Postal Employees on May 16 and 17.  Highlight of this convention will be a banquet at 6:30 on Saturday evening, May 16, in Norse Room of the Hotel Fort Pitt.  This banquet will honor the National President, James B. Cobb...Miss Cora M. Brown, special associate to the General Counsel of the U.S. Post Office Department, and the Hon. Joseph Clarke, staff assistant to assistant Post Master General..."
TitMainTitle: Three men, including James B. Cobb holding plaque with clock, posed in front of Rookwood mural in Norse Room, Fort Pitt Hotel, vertical format
